General_Description: '''Pigsty''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Sometimes soldiers can be [[pig]]s! Actually, if you follow the road going east out of [[Port of Kreusis|Kreusis Port]], there lie pits full of bloody pigs. You can find me on an altar where a sacrificial pig is being prepared.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
